dct_title_s: Map of the Lower Raccoon Creek Basin and adjacent Ohio River tributaries showing availability of underground water
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Underground water resources. Lower Raccoon Creek Basin
dct_description_sm: Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
"Prepared by HENRY L. PREE, JR., Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"
Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Lower Raccoon Creek Basin and quality of underground water.
Scale bar lower right corner of map.
